newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Highlights of Wednesday's Commission briefing. [CORRECTED 11:33 GMT]
newsitem.headline: Highlights of Wednesday's Commission briefing. [CORRECTED 11:33 GMT]

text.p: Following are highlights of the midday briefing by the European Commission on Wednesday:

Spokesman Joao Vale de Almeida (corrects from Thierry Daman) confirmed that the Commission was investigating complaints by British airline EasyJet over alleged unfair practices of KLM Royal Dutch Airlines. He said the Commission was in contact with both airlines but gave no further details.
The Commission released the following documents:
- IP/97/753: Commission approves programme to boost cross-border energy cooperation between Italy and Slovenia
- IP/97/755: Commission clears the acquisition of joint control by ADM and Acatos & Hutcheson Plc over the German soybean crushing company Soja Mainz
- IP/97/756: Commission decides joint venture for waterway transports in Belgium by Stinnes and Haniel is not a concentration under the EU merger regulation
- Eurostat statistics on energy and industry, the monthly panorama of European industry 7/97
- Eurostat statistics on economy and finance, harmonized indices of consumer prices June 1997
- Eurostat ECU-EMS information & central bank interest rates
